name: undefiled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not spoiled or made less beautiful or pure: The purity of my love was something that to me remained undefiled. How refreshing it is to see the World Cup matches being played on pitches undefiled by corporate advertising.
More examplesFewer examplesExternal cleanliness helps cultivate a clean, undefiled mind.Let's choose to abstain from alcohol so our bodies can be pure, holy, and undefiled.Those who are inwardly pure show themselves to be under the power of pure and undefiled religion.
